2025-01-16.description: Suzuki Motor Corp.’s India unit, BYD Co. and VinFast Auto Ltd. are among carmakers gearing to showcase their new electric vehicles in New Delhi as the fight intensifies for the fastest-growing major automobile market where Tesla Inc. is conspicuous by its abs…

2025-01-19.title: BYD’s Supply Chain Financing Masks Ballooning Debt, GMT Says
2025-01-19.description: BYD Co.’s reliance on financing from working capital has masked surging debt levels at the Chinese electric vehicle giant, according to calculations from Hong Kong-based GMT Research.

2025-01-18.title: BYD launches Sealion 7 EV in India, deliveries to begin in March
2025-01-18.description: The company did not give details of pricing as it started accepting bookings for the vehicle at the Bharat Mobility Global Expo 2025

2025-03-04.title: Chinese Automaker BYD to Raise $5.6 Billion Via Share Placement
2025-03-04.description: The fundraising comes as the competition in the new energy vehicles industry is intensifying

2025-03-04.title: BYD Raises $5.6 Billion in Upsized Hong Kong Share Sale
2025-03-04.description: Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD Co. raised HK$43.5 billion ($5.6 billion) in Hong Kong’s biggest share sale in nearly four years.

2025-03-18.title: China’s BYD launches EV charging system it says works nearly as fast as a fill up
2025-03-18.description: BANGKOK (AP) — China’s energy and auto giant BYD has announced an ultra fast EV charging system that it says is nearly as quick as a fill up at the pumps. BYD, China’s largest EV maker, said Monday that its flash-chargers can provide a full charge for its lat…

2025-03-18.title: How BYD’s Five-Minute Charging Stacks Up Against the Competition
2025-03-18.description: Chinese automaking juggernaut BYD Co. is taking things to even greater heights, now staking claim to a system it says will make it as quick to charge an electric vehicle as to refuel a gasoline car.

2025-03-25.title: Chinese EV titan BYD eclipses Tesla with annual sales of more than $100 billion

2025-03-25.title: Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD reports 2024 revenue over $100B, topping Tesla’s sales
2025-03-25.description: BANGKOK (AP) — Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD logged a record 777.1 billion yuan ($107 billion) in revenue last year as its sales of battery electric and hybrid vehicles jumped 40%. The report late Monday coincided with BYD’s launch earlier this week of i…

2025-03-24.title: BYD’s Sales Soar as Chinese Carmaker Captures World’s Attention
2025-03-24.description: BYD Co.’s sales last year surpassed the $100 billion mark, leapfrogging Elon Musk’s Tesla Inc. on revenue, as the Chinese auto giant wows consumers with a range of electric and hybrid cars packed with high-tech features.
